vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Deliver deep, personalized tarot insights for every seeker

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Blend traditional tarot wisdom with modern AI to help you explore your inner world

items.title: Purpose
items.content: This app supports personal growth and self-reflection with tarot guidance for inspiration and entertainment.

items.title: Disclaimer
items.content: Tarot readings are for reference only and do not constitute medical, legal, or financial advice. Please make your own decisions responsibly.

items.title: Suggested Mindset
items.content: Stay open and reflective. Treat readings as prompts for thought, honor your free will, and avoid over-reliance on predictions.

items.title: Age Guidance
items.content: Minors should use the app only with guardian consent and guidance to ensure proper understanding of the tarot content.

important.title: ‚ö° Key Reminder
important.content:
Tarot is a projection tool that encourages reflection.
Use the insights as inspiration, not as absolute truth or direct instructions.

items.title: Data Collection
items.summary: We follow a minimal, necessary data-collection principle
items.details:
We only collect the data required to deliver our services:

‚Ä¢ Reading history: questions, chosen cards, generated insights
‚Ä¢ Preferences: interface settings, language choices, personalization
‚Ä¢ Device info: model and OS version (for compatibility improvements)
‚Ä¢ Usage analytics: feature frequency and navigation paths (to enhance UX)

We never collect your name, address, phone number, or other identity data.

items.title: Data Usage
items.summary: Improve experiences and personalization ‚Äî never sold
items.details:
Your data is used to:

‚Ä¢ Provide tarot reading services
‚Ä¢ Store and sync your reading history
‚Ä¢ Improve features and overall experience
‚Ä¢ Offer tailored recommendations and settings
‚Ä¢ Deliver technical support

We promise:
‚Ä¢ We never sell your data
‚Ä¢ We do not use it for ad targeting
‚Ä¢ We do not share personal data with other apps or services

items.title: Data Protection
items.summary: Encrypted storage, regular audits, export & deletion support
items.details:
We apply industry-standard security measures:

‚Ä¢ Encrypted storage: AES-256 for all data
‚Ä¢ Secure transport: HTTPS/TLS encryption
‚Ä¢ Access control: restricted internal permissions
‚Ä¢ Regular audits: security reviews and vulnerability scans
‚Ä¢ Backup safety: resilient backup and recovery

Your rights:
‚Ä¢ View and export your data anytime
‚Ä¢ Request full deletion of your data
‚Ä¢ Update or correct your information
‚Ä¢ Withdraw consent for data usage
